Title: The Story of Lando Freeman
Plot: There's a new handyman in the neighborhood undercutting Uncle Ruckus... which is all good for Granddad and his garden until the man claims to be his long lost son, Lando. Will Granddad take responsibility and be a father to his child? Not without a talk show paternity test.
ParentalRatingReason: Offensive language and content that may disturb.
GuestStars: Samuel L. Jackson, Billy Dee Williams, John DiMaggio
